title: Toy tiles that talk to each other
description: MIT grad student David Merrill demos Siftables -- cookie-sized, computerized tiles you can stack and shuffle in your hands. These future-toys can do math, play music, and talk to their friends, too. Is this the next thing in hands-on learning?
author: David Merrill
keywords: TED, talks, art, business, children, computers, design, education, invention, music, technology, toy
